product_name: Not Your Mother'sCurl Talk Fragrance-Free Curl Activating Hair Mousse
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsNot Your Mother's Curl Talk Fragrance-Free Activating Mousse secures soft definition with a fragrance-free formula. This curl mousse delivers a no-crunch hold, shine, and lasting humidity protection to fight frizz all day, while playing nice with other products, so you can customize your curl care.
details: DetailsBenefitsCurly hair mousse provides soft, touchable definition and boosts shineHelps curls hold their shape while maintaining natural movementSmooths and tames frizz for a sleek, polished lookProvides flexible control without stiffness or crunchGentle formula hydrates curls without added proteinProtects vibrancy and shine while defining curlsWorks for all curly and wavy hair types, including color-treated hairScent-free option lets you mix and match fragrances to customize your curl careScent TypeFragrance-FreeFormulated WithoutGlutenSiliconesAlcoholFragranceProteinItem 2641608How To UseShake vigorously. Dispense upside down into hand. Start at roots and work evenly through curls. Style as usual.IngredientsWater (Aqua) (Eau), Polyquaternium-46, Isobutane, Propane, Propylene Glycol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Oleth-20, Tocopherol, Benzophenone-4, Propanediol, Phenylpropanol, Hexylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Tetrasodium EDTAShipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake vigorously. Dispense upside down into hand. Start at roots and work evenly through curls. Style as usual.

reviews.headline: Doesn't enhance curls and bottle too broke after one use
reviews.comments: Doesn't enhance curls and bottle too broke after one use, so couldn't even getting the majority of the product out.  Do not buy!

reviews.headline: Made my inconsistently wavy hair, consistently wavy
reviews.comments: I have thin 2a/2b hair and a lot of products weigh my hair down. This mousse has been a game changer. I use it with a leave in conditioner and my hair holds the waves for 2-3 days. I just use a water spray bottle to revive waves in the morning.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail Alert!
reviews.comments:
So the search is over this product is amazing. My curls are defined and frizz free! My hair has bounce and volume! My low porosity, gray hair which literally hates all products is so happy!! I just used a moisturizing shampoo and conditioner and I left some in and then put the mousse in wet hair, not dripping but pretty wet, scrunched and plopped for like 10 minutes, and its like 90 degrees here today and I had to go, so I diffused for 5 minutes and let it air dry and had fabulous results!!

Please, please, please don't ever discontinue your fragrance free line, us scent sensitive people really need companies like you to continue to hear our pleas. Thank you so much!

faceoff_positive.comments:
So the search is over this product is amazing. My curls are defined and frizz free! My hair has bounce and volume! My low porosity, gray hair which literally hates all products is so happy!! I just used a moisturizing shampoo and conditioner and I left some in and then put the mousse in wet hair, not dripping but pretty wet, scrunched and plopped for like 10 minutes, and its like 90 degrees here today and I had to go, so I diffused for 5 minutes and let it air dry and had fabulous results!!

Please, please, please don't ever discontinue your fragrance free line, us scent sensitive people really need companies like you to continue to hear our pleas. Thank you so much!
faceoff_positive.headline: Holy Grail Alert!

faceoff_negative.comments: Unfortunately, while the product claimed to not leave residue or make hair feel crunchy, I did not find this to be true. The first time I used it I thought I used too much, so I tried again using half that amount. While it was a little better, I still found my hair feeling crunchy the next day. I appreciate that this is unscented, and in theory it is a great product but it was not the mousse for me. I know there are a lot of positive reviews for this product, so it may just have not been the right fit for my hair, but I would not purchase this.
faceoff_negative.headline: Leftover residue and crunch

rollup.name: Curl Talk Fragrance-Free Curl Activating Hair Mousse
